title: ➤Beautiful 4 Bed in Somerville! Brand New Renovations! Ava. 9/1!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 301107623', 'Rent: $4,800 / Month', 'Beds: 4', 'Bath: 2', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'Parking:: street parking', 'Gorgeous 4 bed/2 bath in Somerville is going to be complete by 9/1 and will be ready for a 9/1 move in!', 'Located close to East Somerville and extremely to get into Cambridge from here!', 'Multiple bus lines are close by and super accessible.', 'This unit will feature:', '-Massive living room in an open floor plan', '-Skylight above beautiful winding staircase', '-Gorgeous white-granite counters', '-New cabinets', '-New stainless-steel appliances', '-Hardwood floors', '-Modern/tiled bathrooms', '-Central heat and AC (with NEST thermostat)', '-In-unit laundry', '-Bike room available for tenants use', '-Private deck', 'Low move-in costs and the LANDLORD WILL PAY THE BROKER FEE!', "Easy to show, reach out now, units won't last in this crazy market!", "Move in costs: Last month's rent", 'Please email Terry or respond to this ad to schedule a showing and get more info on this unit and other apartment options!', 'Email: Terry @ benjaminapartments .', 'com (Remove the spaces)', 'Search Boston’s largest selection of apartments at https://ygl.is/terry-zhu-agent', 'Nearby transportation:', 'Bus: 91 25 Webster Ave @ Newton St (0.51 mi)', 'Bus: 87 Somerville Ave @ Merriam St (0.38 mi)', 'Bus: 85 Summer St @ Wesley Park (0.45 mi)', 'Bus: CT2 30 Prospect St (0.44 mi)', 'Bus: 86 Washington St @ Tufts St (0.20 mi)', 'Bus: 88 422 McGrath Hwy (0.11 mi)', 'Bus: 90 Cross St @ Auburn Ave (0.02 mi)', 'Bus: 80 Cross St @ Fountain Ave (0.02 mi)', 'Bus: 101 Broadway @', 'Cross St (0.39 mi)', 'Bus: 95 Mystic Ave @ Plaza Entrance - Home Depot (0.61 mi)', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
